00035     public static function dateDiff( $dtStart, $dtEnd = null, $bAbsolute = false )
00036     {
00037         $_dtStart = new DateTime( $dtStart );
00038         $_dtEnd = new DateTime( PS::nvl( $dtEnd, date( 'Y-m-d H:i:s' ) ) );
00039         return $_dtEnd->diff( $_dtStart, $bAbsolute );
00040     }

00049     public static function zoneDiff( $sTimeZone, $sMyZone = null )
00050     {
00051         $sMyZone = PS::nvl( $sMyZone, date_default_timezone_get() );
00052         
00053         $_oDest = new DateTimeZone( $sTimeZone );
00054         $_oSrc = new DateTimeZone( $sMyZone );
00055         
00056         $_oDestTime = new DateTime( 'now', $_oDest );
00057         $_oSrcTime = new DateTime( 'now', $_oSrc );
00058         
00059         return $_oDest->getOffset( $_oSrcTime );
00060     }

00071     }

00091     public static function format( $dtDate = null, $sFormat = 'Y-m-d H:i:s' )
00092     {
00093         return date( $sFormat, $dtDate ? strtotime( $dtDate ) : time() );
00094     }
00095     
00100     public static function isValid( $dtValue )
00101     {
00102         if ( preg_match( "/^(\d{4})-(\d{2})-(\d{2}) ([01][0-9]|2[0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9])$/", $dtValue, $_arMatches ) )
00103         {
00104             if ( checkdate( $_arMatches[2], $_arMatches[3], $_arMatches[1] ) )
00105                 return true;
00106         }
00107 
00108         return false;
00109     }
